oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grand Army of the Republic medal given to John G. Decker
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Grand Army of the Republic medal given to John G. Decker, who served in Co. K, 32nd Ind. Vol. Inf., USA, from 1861 to 1866. Numerous letters written by Decker are included in the collection. See also the John G. Decker Papers, Mf. 1964.
